alert.note: Alert for Central Oahu; Koolau Leeward; Koolau Windward; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Waianae Mountains (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 7:49PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT OAHU IN HONOLULU COUNTY THROUGH 915 PM HST... At 748 PM HST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Waialua to 46 miles southwest of Barbers Point. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 35 to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wahiawa, Waialua, Schofield Barracks, Laie, Waianae, Wheeler Field, Kahuku, Nanakuli, Haleiwa, Hauula, Makakilo, Mililani, Whitmore Village, Makua Valley, Lualualei, Maili, Kaena State Park, Helemano Housing, Pupukea, and Makaha. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
